name: NodeJSRunner
description: Use this task in a build or release pipeline to run a JS script.
author: Carlos Flor
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about this task](https://github.com/carlosgit2016/nodejs-runner) or [see the NodeJS Docs](https://nodejs.org/en/docs/)

inputs.name: scriptSource
inputs.label: Script Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target script type, must be a file path or inline script

inputs.name: scriptPath
inputs.label: Script path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the script to execute, must be relative or absolute. [More Information](https://github.com/carlosgit2016/nodejs-runner#arguments)

inputs.name: inlineScript
inputs.label: Inline Script
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source code to execute, the task create a temp file to execute. [More Information](https://github.com/carlosgit2016/nodejs-runner#inline-execution)

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments passed to the script execution. [More Information](https://github.com/carlosgit2016/nodejs-runner#arguments)

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path where the script file runs, if empty the default path is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory). [More Information](https://github.com/carlosgit2016/nodejs-runner#arguments)
